name: Amal Al Kuwait
description: Enjoy 15% instant discount on all Amal Al Kuwait products when using your eligible NBK Card.Offer valid till 31 December 2025Aisha Alraqum PhysiotherapyGet 8% in NBK Rewards Points upon spending KD 40 or more at Aisha Alraqum Physiotherapy.BMWBuy a BMW car from Ali Alghanim & Sons Automotive and benefit from 0% interest on your Auto Loan.

name: Qatar Airways
description: Enjoy up to 12% discount on your tickets through Qatar Airways dedicated page using promo code QRKWNBK.Offer valid till 30 April 2026Luxurious Shopping Experience - PrivilegeYour shopping experience is leveled up at participating boutiques in selected VALUE RETAIL outlets.Offer valid till 31 December 2025Hajj Season Offer - VisaApply for a NBK SAR Prepaid Card this Hajj season and get the issuance fee waived.Offer valid till 18 June 2025Dubai Travel Offer - VisaYour Dubai trip gets better with up to 30% off dining, shopping, fashion and more when using your eligible NBK Visa Card.Offer valid till 30 June 2025Grand Hyatt Kuwait - PrivilegeGet special room rates and enjoy 15% discount at Stambul and Liberté restaurants.

name: Petsmarket
description: Enjoy 10% instant discount when shopping through Petsmarket's website or app and using promo code NBK2025.SnigglesGet 10% in NBK Rewards Points upon spending KD 30 or more at Sniggles' store.deliveroo - PlusGet a KD 1.5 voucher to use on deliveroo when ordering coffee every Sunday with Plus Package.

name: Waha Lifestyle
description: Enjoy 15% instant discount when shopping from Waha Lifestyle's store, website or app and using promo code NBK15.DIGITS - Al ShababGet up to 30% discount on the latest selected tech devices and accessories at DIGITS store.Offer valid till 31 December 2025Cinescape - PlusBuy a ticket from Cinescape Cinemas and get the second ticket for free at selected locations.Offer valid till 31 December 2025Cinescape - PrivilegeGet a free ticket with "Buy 1 Get 1 Free" offer.Offer valid till 31 December 2025Umrah Special Offers - VisaGet up to 30% discount and many special offers at selected hotels when you book your Umrah trip.

name: Faces - Privilege
description: Enjoy 15% exclusive discount on all products at Faces stores.Offer valid till 31 December 2025Triple MGet 5% in NBK Rewards Points upon spending KD 250 or more at Triple M.Zain - PlusGet 10% cashback in NBK KWT Points when using NBK KWT Visa Infinite Credit Card at Zain.Offer valid till 31 December 2025Cinescape - Al ShababBuy a ticket from Cinescape Cinemas and get the second ticket for free every Wednesday at selected locations.Offer valid till 31 December 2025Grand Hyatt Kuwait - ThahabiGet special room rates and enjoy 15% discount at Stambul and Liberté restaurants.
